title: Question - Low Priority Q?
body:
Hi there, a have this friend who consistently leaves games and is in low priority q, and when I ask to if he wants to play he often says hes in low priority q with 20 min q. He will eventually finish his q after some time but he eventually just gets in it again, the 20 min q
So my question is - **Is there a way to lower the Low Priority Q timer?**

Also mb for posting in wrong area

replies.body: Even easier, stop afk'ing or make sure you have enough free time so you wouldn't have to afk.

Unfortunately, there is no way to lower the time taken in the priority queue, however, i DO think RIot should change it so that if the person finishes his queue then for the next blablabla days he should not be able to get the ban again or in the game that he just finished... Hope that helps? :D
